DataElement.preferredName: Nucleated Red Blood Cell Laboratory Procedure Missing Value Reason Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator that describes the reason the laboratory procedure for the nucleated red blood cells is missing.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Nucleated Red Blood Cell Laboratory Procedure
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Red blood cells that are at the last stage of development, still containing a nucleus, that are found in the bone marrow and occasionally in the peripheral blood._Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting.
